Package simplenlg.syntax.english

This package contains the necessary classes for running the syntax processor for the English language.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
SyntaxProcessor This is the processor for handling syntax within the SimpleNLG.
 

Package simplenlg.syntax.english Description

This package contains the necessary classes for running the syntax processor for the English language. It contains the main processor plus helper classes for the realisation of particular phrase types.
